subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Transfusions
Blood
lead_paragraph: A new test raised questions about the possibility of an endurance-boosting blood transfusion for the Tour de France winner Alberto Contador.
